snippet: RoseAnne Spradlin Dance’s “beginning of something” brings the performers to the edge of the audience.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews dance piece entitled beginning of something, performed by RoseAnne Spradlin Dance at New York Live Arts.
lead_paragraph: RoseAnne Spradlin Dance’s “beginning of something” brings the performers to the edge of the audience.

headline.seo: New York Live Arts Presents RoseAnne Spradlin Work
headline.main: Slipping Into and Out of Something Comfortable
